devdoc.author: Stanislav Trenev
devdoc.details: All function calls are implemented for the ConsenSys Developer bootcamp. It might not be safe to use it in production environment

params.ownerAddress: The address of the proof's owner
The address of the proof's owner

params.ipfsHash: The ipfs hash we are checking

returns._0: boolean if the hash is already stored

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

saveProofOfExistence(string,string,strin.details: External function which is executed when the contract is not paused

params._documentType: The document type of the stored document
params._ipfsHash: The ipfs hash of the stored document
params._timeStamp: The timestamp of the stored document

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.withdrawAmount: The amount to withdraw by the owner of the contract

devdoc.title: A proof of existence contract which stores ipfs hashes, timestamps and document types
